item.description: Just one time, somewhere in your application’s global scope. It should be looked upon as part of your application’s configuration. If your application has three .py files in a package, you could, for example, place the sessionmaker line in your __init__.

item.title: 執拗なメモを取る人の一日 | HackerNoon
item.description: When it comes to taking notes, some people might think a few key phrases jotted down on a scrap piece of paper is good enough. But for me — an obsessive note-taker — that would never cut it. I used to be a person who never really wrote anything down.

item.title: ヘルスケアデータをGrafanaで見たくない…？〜健康 Reliability Engineering〜
